Global_Variables:
! This file is used to set values for the environment/global variables
! Machine IP address for proxy localhost
! TC 3.0 application URL ! Variable "VAR_Columbia_APPURL" is used to set the URL for TC 3.0 URL
http://192.16.17.33/adminportal/login.do http://192.16.17.33/viewerportal/
!Variable VAR_USR is used to set the User name for the Login !Variable VAR_USR is used to set the User name for the Login
admin@qumu.com password
!VAR_MIN_WAIT, VAR_MED_WAIT and VAR_MAX_WAIT variables are used to set the Wait Parameters for Browser Synchronization 40000 70000 100000
!Variable VAR_BROWSER_PATH is used to set the Browser exe path in the script
*iexplore
!Variable Var_frameWork_Path is defined for the framework path E:\Automation_WorkSpace\Columbia_automation\src\com\qa\columbia
!Variable VAR_dom is used to provide the domain name in the Browser. domain
!Variable VAR_dom is used to provide the domain name in the Browser domain
!Variable VAR_SiteURL is used to provide the site URL in the Browser. http://192.16.17.33
!Variable VAR_Storage is used to provide the storage name (Shared Folder should be created on server) in the Browser. auto_storage
!Variable VAR_AP_Host is used to provide the HTTP Host Name in the Browser. 192.16.17.33
!Variable VAR_AP_MountPoint is used to provide the mount point (Virtual Directory need to be created on IIS) name in the Browser. auto_storage
!Variable VAR_WMS is used to provide the HTTP Host in the Browser. 192.16.17.33
!Variable VAR_WMS is used to select the HTTP Access Point in the Browser. Download
!Variable VAR_Select_Storage is used to select Storage in the Browser. !auto_storage
!//*********************************WME***********************//
!Variable VAR_Program is used to select Encoder WME-N
!Variable VAR_Program is used to select Encoder WME-Profile

!Variable Var_WME_ComPort is used to provide the Communication Port 5201
!Variable Var_WME_DocRoot is used to provide the Document Root for encoder files c:\windows\temp
!Variable Var_WMEProf_Port is used to Port for WME output 3000
!Variable Var_WMEProf_Path is used to provide the path for the .wme file D:\EncoderProfile\test1.wme
!Variable Var_WMEProf_Videosize is used to provide the video size 400x226 (16x9)
!Variable Var_WMEProf_BitRate is used to provide the Bitrate 400
